description:
PSF Board elections are a chance for the community to choose representatives to help the PSF create a vision for and build the future of the Python community. This year there are 3 seats open on the PSF board. Check out who is currently on the PSF Board. (D√©bora Azevedo, Kwon-Han Bae, and Tania Allard are at the end of their current terms.)

Board Election Timeline

  • Nominations open: Tuesday, June 11th, 2:00 pm UTC
  • Nomination cut-off: Tuesday, June 25th, 2:00 pm UTC
  • Voter application/affirmation cut-off date: Tuesday, June 25th, 2:00 pm UTC
  • Announce candidates: Thursday, June 27th
  • Voting start date: Tuesday, July 2nd, 2:00 pm UTC
  • Voting end date: Tuesday, July 16th, 2:00 pm UTC

Voting

You must be a contributing, managing, supporting, or fellow member by June 25th t
title: PSF Board Election Dates for 2024
